VMMC Safdarjung Hospital Recruitment 2025 - Walk - in for 89 Junior Resident Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 21, 2025, 16:17 IST
 Safdarjung Hospital
 89 Jobs |  Posted On : 21-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 56,100 to 56,100




FOLLOW

The Vardhman Mahavir Medical College and Safdarjung Hospital (VMMC Safdarjung Hospital) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 89 Junior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the deadline. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS can apply for the VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun. 




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Resident	89	MBBS, BDS

VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 56,100/- per month.
How to Apply for the VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the VMMC Safdarjung Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Carry the filled application form to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Lecture Theatre -I, First Floor, VMMC Building, Safdarjung Hospital, New Delhi.

Important Dates:

Starting date	19-08-2025
Closing date	26-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
